"use client" import React from "react" import { useState } from "react" // Mock data for bookings const upcomingBookings = [ { id: "1", fieldName: "Terrain Central", location: "Stade Municipal, Paris", date: "2024-01-15", time: "18:00 - 20:00", duration: "2h", price: 80, status: "confirmed", players: "10/14", surface: "Gazon naturel", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, { id: "2", fieldName: "Terrain Nord", location: "Complex Sportif, Lyon", date: "2024-01-18", time: "20:00 - 21:30", duration: "1h30", price: 60, status: "pending", players: "8/12", surface: "Synthétique", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, { id: "3", fieldName: "Terrain Sud", location: "Centre Sportif, Marseille", date: "2024-01-22", time: "16:00 - 18:00", duration: "2h", price: 90, status: "confirmed", players: "14/16", surface: "Gazon naturel", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, ] const bookingHistory = [ { id: "4", fieldName: "Terrain Est", location: "Stade Olympique, Nice", date: "2024-01-05", time: "19:00 - 21:00", duration: "2h", price: 75, status: "completed", players: "12/14", surface: "Synthétique", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, { id: "5", fieldName: "Terrain Ouest", location: "Complex Municipal, Toulouse", date: "2023-12-28", time: "15:00 - 17:00", duration: "2h", price: 70, status: "completed", players: "10/12", surface: "Gazon naturel", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, { id: "6", fieldName: "Terrain Central", location: "Stade Municipal, Paris", date: "2023-12-20", time: "18:00 - 19:30", duration: "1h30", price: 55, status: "cancelled", players: "6/10", surface: "Synthétique", image: "/placeholder.svg?height=100&width=150&text=Football+Field", }, ] // Status styling helper const getStatusStyles = (status: string) => { switch (status) { case "confirmed": return "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border border-green-200" case "pending": return "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border border-yellow-200" case "cancelled": return "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border border-red-200" case "completed": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border border-blue-200" default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 border border-gray-200" } } // Status icon component const StatusIcon = ({ status }: { status: string }) => { switch (status) { case "confirmed": return ( ) case "pending": return ( ) case "cancelled": return ( ) case "completed": return ( ) default: return null } } // Dropdown component const Dropdown = ({ children, trigger }: { children: React.ReactNode; trigger: React.ReactNode }) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) return (
{isOpen && ( <>
setIsOpen(false)} />
{children}
)}
) } export default function UserDashboard() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("upcoming") const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState("all") const filteredHistory = bookingHistory.filter((booking) => { const matchesSearch = booking.fieldName.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || booking.location.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) const matchesStatus = statusFilter === "all" || booking.status === statusFilter return matchesSearch && matchesStatus }) const totalBookings = upcomingBookings.length + bookingHistory.length const totalSpent = [...upcomingBookings, ...bookingHistory] .filter((b) => b.status !== "cancelled") .reduce((sum, booking) => sum + booking.price, 0) return (
{/* Header */}

{booking.time} ({booking.duration})
{booking.players} joueurs • {booking.surface}

{booking.price}€

} >
))}
)}
)} {/* History Tab */} {activeTab === "history" && (

Historique des Réservations

setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 w-64" />
{filteredHistory.length === 0 ? (

Aucune réservation trouvée

) : (
{filteredHistory.map((booking) => (
